casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Salim Abdu GOULD 91P14-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 16, 2017 Salim Abdu Gould, for Gould, Salim Abdu. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Valerie Mitchell Asbell, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th of November 2017 by Defendant for Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of November 2017."
